700547f-a.title: Bronx: Boston Road - Astor Avenue
700547f-a.text:
Boston Road, east side, north from and including Astor Ave., showing
cleared area at the S.E. corner of the aforementioned thoroughfares and
a steam-shovel tearing down the hill on the N.E. corner.
July 28, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
700547f-a.folder: Boston Road & Astor Avenue, Bronx, NY
